full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYIS CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHI YE KUN KUN DGA' DON ZHES BGYIS PA'I 'BANGS, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DANG DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON GRUS GNYIS KA 'DIS LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BSRUNG BA'I CHER DU, ,BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM @008B RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS THA SHAL GA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O, ,BKRA SHIS SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
